unnormalised: RBI kept the repo rate unchanged at 6.5% in its latest monetary policy meet. Market analysts were expecting this, so no major knee-jerk reaction seen.
normalised: R-B-I kept the repo rate unchanged at six point five percent in its latest monetary policy meet. Market analysts were expecting this, so no major knee-jerk reaction seen.

unnormalised: Reports suggest that foreign investors have pulled out around Rs. 12,000 crore from the Indian equity market in the month of May, citing concerns over election outcome jitters.
normalised: Reports suggest that foreign investors have pulled out around rupee twelve thousand crore from the Indian equity market in the month of May, citing concerns over election outcome jitters.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, gold prices continue their upward trend, hitting a record high of ₹72,000 per 10 grams on MCX. Experts advise retail investors to allocate 10-15% of their portfolio to gold as a hedge against inflation.
normalised: Meanwhile, gold prices continue their upward trend, hitting a record high of rupee seventy two thousand per ten grams on M-C-X. Experts advise retail investors to allocate ten to fifteen percent of their portfolio to gold as a hedge against inflation.

unnormalised: Crypto remains volatile, with Bitcoin fluctuating between $67,000 and $70,000. Dogecoin, however, saw a 5% jump after Elon Musk tweeted about it…again! Remember, crypto investments carry high risk; do your research!
normalised: Crypto remains volatile, with Bitcoin fluctuating between dollar sixty seven thousand and dollar seventy thousand. Dogecoin, however, saw a five percent jump after Elon Musk tweeted about it…again! Remember, crypto investments carry high risk; do your research!

unnormalised: Overall, a mixed bag for investors this week. Keep a close watch on election results; that will likely be a major market mover in the days to come. Consult your financial advisor before making any big decisions.
normalised: Overall, a mixed bag for investors this week. Keep a close watch on election results; that will likely be a major market mover in the days to come. Consult your financial advisor before making any big decisions.
